column5: Lots of great info in this Q&A....  http://www.outdoorontario.net/AskMNR/mnrfaqfish.html
they ended it about 12 years ago  but it may have some answers people are looking for

I got this answer from the MNR years ago for the same question....  If anglers accidentally catch a fish out of season they have to release that fish immediately. Therefore, they are not allowed to keep it while taking pictures.  Thank you  ********************************************* Natural Resources Information Centre P.O. Box 7000 Peterborough, ON  K9J 8M5
If I am fishing walleye in 2 zones eq. 8 and 10 am I allowed 6 fish in my possession as long as I don't keep more than 4 from 1 zone. Thanks
I'm not trying to stir the pot with this thread.  Lots of helpful information in the link.
The thread is fine the pot stirrer has had his spoon taken away.   Art
